item.title: [Visual Studio Code] vscode quick pick çš„ height æ€ä¹ˆæ”¹é«˜?
[React] åˆšå­¦ä¹ React è¯·æ•™ä¸€ä¸ª useState æœ‰å…³çš„é—®é¢˜
item.description:
ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹:

import React from 'react';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function App() {
  const [arr, setArr] = useState([0]);

  useEffect(() => {
    console.log(arr);
  }, [arr]);

  const handleClick = () => {
    Promise.resolve()
      .then(() => {
        setArr(prevState => [...prevState, 1]);
      })
      .then(() => {
        Promise.resolve()
          .then(() => {
            setArr(prevState => [...prevState, 2]);
          })
          .then(() => {
            setArr(prevState => [...prevState, 5]);
          })
          .then(() => {
            setArr(prevState => [...prevState, 6]);
          });
      })
      .then(() => {
        setArr(prevState => {
          setArr(prevState => [...prevState, 4]);
          return [...prevState, 3];
        });
      })
      .catch(e => {
        console.log(e);
      });
  };

  return (
    <>
      <button onClick={handleClick}>change</button>
    </>
  );
}

ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®å,æ§åˆ¶å°çš„ç»“æœæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸º

(1) [0]
(2) [0, 1]
(5) [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]
(6) [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
(7) [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
